statements: SELECT * FROM population_data WHERE city_name='New York';
SELECT city_name,population FROM population_data WHERE population > 1000000 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT city_name,population,land_area FROM population_data ORDER BY land_area;
SELECT city_name,population,land_area FROM population_data WHERE population > 500000 AND land_area < 50 ORDER BY population DESC, land_area;
SELECT AVG(population) AS average_population FROM population_data;
SELECT city_name, population, land_area FROM population_data WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT city_name, population FROM population_data WHERE land_area > 50 ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT city_name, land_area, population FROM population_data WHERE land_area < 30 AND population < 50000;
SELECT city_name, population, land_area FROM population_data WHERE population BETWEEN 50000 AND 150000 ORDER BY land_area DESC;
SELECT city_name, population, land_area FROM population_data WHERE land_area > 20 OR population > 80000 ORDER BY population ASC;
SELECT city_name, population FROM CityPopulation;
SELECT city_name, land_area FROM CityPopulation WHERE population > 100000;
SELECT * FROM ZoningRegulations;
SELECT city_name, zoning_category FROM ZoningRegulations WHERE zoning_code = 'R1';
SELECT city_name, population, land_area FROM CityPopulation ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT city_name, population FROM CityPopulation WHERE city_name = 'New York';
SELECT city_name, zoning_category FROM ZoningRegulations ORDER BY city_name DESC;
SELECT city_name, population, land_area FROM CityPopulation WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY population ASC, land_area DESC;

SELECT city_name, population, zoning_category FROM CityPopulation LEFT JOIN ZoningRegulations ON CityPopulation.city_name = ZoningRegulations.city_name WHERE population > 50000 ORDER BY zoning_category ASC, population DESC;
SELECT city_name, zoning_code FROM ZoningRegulations WHERE zoning_category = 'Residential' ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT city_name, population_count FROM Population_Data;
SELECT * FROM Population_Data ORDER BY population_count DESC;
SELECT city_name, avg_age, avg_household_income FROM City_Demographics WHERE avg_age > 30;
SELECT city_name, median_income, population_count FROM Population_Data WHERE median_income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM Zoning_Regulations WHERE area_size < 1000 ORDER BY max_building_height ASC;
SELECT city_name, population_count FROM Population_Data WHERE population_count > 100000 ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT zoning_category, max_building_height FROM Zoning_Regulations WHERE area_size < 5000 ORDER BY max_building_height DESC;
SELECT city_name, avg_age, avg_household_income FROM City_Demographics WHERE avg_household_income > 60000 ORDER BY avg_age ASC, city_name DESC;
SELECT city_name, population_count, median_income FROM Population_Data WHERE city_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY population_count DESC, median_income ASC;
SELECT zoning_category, area_size, max_building_height FROM Zoning_Regulations WHERE max_building_height > 10 AND area_size BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY zoning_category ASC, area_size ASC;
SELECT city_name, population FROM city_population;
SELECT * FROM zoning_regulations ORDER BY zone_type DESC;
SELECT city_name, density FROM population_density WHERE density > 1000;
SELECT * FROM zoning_permit WHERE issue_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT city_name, population FROM city_population WHERE population < 50000;
SELECT city_name, population FROM city_population WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT permit_number, issue_date FROM zoning_permit WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT zone_type, area_size, building_height FROM zoning_regulations WHERE area_size >= 5000 AND building_height <= 10 ORDER BY zone_type ASC;
SELECT city_name, density FROM population_density WHERE density > 500 ORDER BY density DESC, city_name ASC;

SELECT city_name, population, density FROM city_population JOIN population_density ON city_population.city_name = population_density.city_name WHERE population > 50000 AND density < 1000 ORDER BY population DESC, density ASC;
SELECT city_name, population, median_age FROM city_population;
SELECT * FROM zoning_regulations ORDER BY allowed_population_density DESC;
SELECT city_id, year, population, average_income FROM demographic_data WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT city_id, latitude, longitude FROM city_geography WHERE elevation > 500;
SELECT city_name, median_age, average_income FROM city_population ORDER BY median_age ASC, average_income DESC;
SELECT city_name, population FROM city_population;
SELECT * FROM zoning_regulations WHERE allowed_population_density > 500;
SELECT city_name, population, median_age FROM city_population WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY median_age DESC;
SELECT city_id, year, population, average_income FROM demographic_data WHERE year = 2022 ORDER BY average_income DESC;
SELECT city_name, latitude, longitude, elevation FROM city_geography ORDER BY city_name ASC, elevation DESC;
